name: Note
description: Represents a note that a user can attach to a parent object record.
summary: The object {Note} in Salesforce is used for storing notes related to sales activities. It has attributes such as Id, IsDeleted, ParentId, Title, IsPrivate, Body, OwnerId, CreatedDate, CreatedById, LastModifiedDate, LastModifiedById, and SystemModstamp. These attributes store information about the note's unique identifier, deletion status, parent record, title, privacy setting, content, owner, creation date, last modification date, and system timestamp.
label: Note
